items.sentence: If Tom asks how he can help, what should I tell him?
One drop of the poison is enough to kill 160 people.
It's just a matter of time until this happens again.
I'm sure that you'll enjoy studying French with Tom.
Where's that bottle of wine that I asked you to buy?
Tom is probably not going to permit Mary to do that.
In the future, astronauts will grow carrots on Mars.
I hope Tom does everything that he's promised to do.
Why don't we postpone the meeting until next Monday?
I don't think that Tom could see what was happening.
